resources.string: Front camera background blur is off
Front camera background blur is on
Switch between photo and video modes
Flash is working in the Soft light mode
Turned off shooting in landscape mode
Take a photo while shooting a video
Turned off Ultra wide angle mode
Turned on Ultra wide angle mode
Button for taking photos while shooting videos
"Recognize scenes using AI and adjust preferences automatically"
When shooting on a crowded street, ask your subject to stand still. Other people will appear as blurry trails.
You can also take pictures of busy traffic and moving crowds. Long exposure will keep the buildings crisp, but all moving objects will be blurry.
Use a light source to \"paint\" over a dark scene to bring all the lit pieces together in one image.
Use this mode in places with low light pollution. The exposure will be set to %d seconds, so using a tripod is a great idea.
Use this mode in places with low light pollution. The exposure can be set up to %d seconds, so using a tripod is a great idea.
Use this mode when shooting moving clouds. It will give the sky an \"oil painting\" effect.
This mode makes moving water (rivers, waterfalls, and lakes) look like satin.
"Shooting the starry sky for a long time can capture the trajectories of stars. Don't forget to use a tripod and shoot continuously for at least %d minutes."
"Shooting the starry sky for a long time can capture the trajectories of stars. Don't forget to use a tripod! Shoot continuously for at least %d minutes to be able to get both photos and videos."
At night, you can capture the trajectory of bright moving lights (on cars and ships, for example). This mode allows to preview the final result on your screen in real time.
Use a tripod to capture a longer exposure
"Tap an object to keep it in focus while it's moving. Stay at least 3 meters away for best effect."
Shoot in landscape mode for best effect

Figure effects work only for one person shots
You can record up to 6 minutes in 8K
"Still can't connect to camera. Try restarting your device."
Taking photo, keep the device still
Your device is overheated. Camera will be closed in %d seconds. Your photos or videos will be saved automatically.
Avoid moving objects and monotone backgrounds.
Hold your device steady and make sure your subject is sufficiently lit.
Come up with your own ideas.
Cloning only works in landscape mode
Tap the shutter button to start
Too much movement. Try starting over.
Return your device to the original position
You moved the device too far. Stopped capturing for now.
"Your device is overheated. Can't use flash now."
"Your device is overheated. Can't use flash now."
"Scanner allows you to scan QR codes, barcodes, and more. You don't have to connect to the internet to install it."

string.name: confirm_location_message
string.Data:
Welcome to Camera! Tagging your photos and videos with the locations where they are taken will make your Gallery more organized and help you find items faster. Some features might not be available if you restrict adding location info.

We shall protect your personal information in accordance with the relevant laws, regulations, and privacy policies.

resources.string: "Another app may already be using the device's microphone to record."
Reset all parameters to their default values?
Welcome to Camera! You can use this app to take photos and shoot videos. This app needs to connect to the internet and requires the following optional permissions:
For adding location info to photos and videos
"Optional permissions (Used for additional features while you're using them)"

string.name: cta_user_tips
string.Data: To fully understand your rights as a user as well as the ways in which we use your data, read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy.

resources.string: This text will appear as the second line of your watermark. It can contain up to 18 letters or 14 Chinese characters.
Up to %1$d Chinese characters or %2$d letters.
The text you entered is too long
The lens is dirty. Wipe it clean.
"Line up and enhance scanned documents automatically"
The camera is too close to the object.
"Make sure the object isn't further than 2 meters."
Slow-motion capture will start at the last quarter of the recording
"Taking selfies will be easier if you rotate your phone"
Show your palm to the camera to start timer
Tap the screen to wake Camera
"In low light, camera will take multiple photos and then create a shot with a minimal amount of noise."
Auto focus and auto exposure have been locked.
Auto focus and auto exposure have been locked. Switch to Google Lens in the Camera settings
Photo watermark will be added automatically.
Eye sparkle effects work best when flash is on
The video you shoot will be played faster.
"Camera will take multiple photos and then create a shot where everyone looks best."
Shoot in landscape mode for best effect
The video you shoot will be played slower.
Dual camera watermark will be added automatically.
Scan the back side of your ID
Scan the front side of your ID
"Combine both sides of your ID in one image. Print the copy wirelessly on A4 paper."
"Looks like your camera's lens is dirty. Clean the lens for better effect."
Place your subject in the frame
"You can use studio lighting effects in Portrait mode"
Some features might not work properly when system time is incorrect.
A network error occurred. Tap to try again.
Remember locations for photos and videos
Allow Camera to access your location in the Settings.
Press and hold to burst shoot
Press and hold to record video
"Distance between the lens and the object shouldn't exceed 10cm"
"Use Macro mode to make small objects look larger on photos"
Long pressing the volume button triggers NFC now. Replace this feature?
Move the camera farther away from the face
Move the camera closer to the face
Keep your face inside the frame
All the changes will be discarded once you go back. Go back anyway?
All the changes will be discarded. Cancel anyway?
All the changes will be discarded once you start over. Start over anyway?
Tap to take a photo. Press and hold to record a video.
Learn more about new features in Camera
All changes will be lost if you exit now. Exit anyway?
Press and hold an item to rearrange
"Select how you'd like to arrange all camera modes"
"Camera can't be used in multi-window mode"

string.name: network_access_user_notice_message_live_video
string.Data:
"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide effects, music, and other features for short videos.

By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."

string.name: network_access_user_notice_message_mi_live_video
string.Data:
Welcome to short videos! Our service needs to connect to the network to provide you with music and other features.

Before using our service, you need to read and agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy, as well as allow the app to connect to the internet.

string.name: network_access_user_notice_message_sticker
string.Data:
"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide stickers for this feature.

By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."

string.name: network_access_user_notice_message_voice_caption
string.Data:
"Camera needs to connect to the internet to provide speech-to-text output functionality.

By tapping \"Agree\" below, you're agreeing to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy, and allowing Camera to connect to the internet."

resources.string: Insert SD card before using camera
To select an object, simultaneously tap two diagonal points around its border.
"This feature can't be used in multi-window mode"
Tap the arrow to change direction
Move your device continuously along the line
Align the arrow with the reference line
Tap the arrow to switch direction and begin panning slowly.
Take more creative control over your photos and videos
You can drag the exposure ring away from the focus ring and adjust the two parameters separately.

"Automatic shutter speed is determined by the camera's light meter. When you select shutter speed manually, remember that the longer the shutter is open, the more light gets on the sensor, making your image brighter."
This feature allows you to compensate exposure when you want your image to be brighter or darker than the meter suggests.
Highlight underexposed areas in blue and overexposed areas in red to be able to adjust exposure correctly.
You can focus both manually and automatically. The greater focus value you select on the slider, the farther from the lens the in-focus area will be.

Histogram is a real-time representation of exposure indicating the darkest parts of your scene on the left going across to the brightest parts on the right. The vertical part of the scale shows how much of the scene is bright or dark.

ISO values can be determined automatically by the light meter. You can also change the value manually. Remember that higher ISO makes your camera more sensitive to light, but brings more digital noise into your image.
"You can switch between multiple available lenses: "
This format records video with logarithmic function applied to the exposure curve in order to capture more details in highlights and shadows, giving you more options in post-processing.

Average metering takes into account all areas of your image, working best for evenly lit scenes. Center-weighted metering mainly focuses on the central area of the frame and gives due consideration to the brightness of the surrounding area, which is suitable for shooting subjects in the center of the frame. Spot metering only covers the area in one spot, giving you precise control over the exposure.
"When you're focusing manually, use focus peaking to place a red highlight on in-focus area."
This image format captures all image data recorded by the sensor when you take a photo. Uncompressed data gives you more options in post-processing.
Besides the white balance presets (incandescent, daylight, fluorescent, cloudy), you can also set white balance to a custom value within the 2000–8000 Kelvin range.
Drag the zoom slider up and down to change your shot smoothly from a long shot to a close-up.
Looks like somebody in the frame closed their eyes
Looks like the person in the frame closed their eyes
Looks like the lense is partly covered
"Use Portrait mode to blur the background on your photos"
"Portrait mode blurs the background and brings out the people in the front."
"Try Portrait mode. Keep the subject sharp while blurring the background."
Select best moment automatically when pressing the shutter button
To select an object, tap two diagonal points around its border. When the object is stationary, the camera will snap a shot automatically.
Decrease frame rate in low light conditions from %1$d to %2$d FPS to improve video quality
Adjust frame rate to low light
The duration of a shooting session is unlimited by default. You can also set the timer which will stop the session at a fixed moment.
Time-lapse videos shot at higher speed are shorter and more condensed. Here are the speed values suitable for different scenes:
Tap to focus, then tap again to take a photo.
"Photos in high efficiency image file format take up less storage space, but aren't supported by some apps"
"High efficiency image file format saves storage space, but isn't supported by some third party apps. You can't take live photos and remove watermarks in HEIF."
Improve image quality using the smart algorithm. Image capture speed may decrease when this feature is on.
Press & hold Shutter button to lock AE/AF/AWB
Notify about current orientation when the phone is parallel to the ground
Correct distorted faces of the people who are close to the edge of the frame
Correct face distortions on group photos
Lock touch gestures when placed in a pocket
Show age when Beautify is on
Show age and gender when Beautify is on
Press and hold the Volume down button when the screen is off to take a photo
延长触摸对焦超时时间
Correct distortion in ultra wide shots
开启视频平滑变焦功能
Show face frame in Video mode
Tap \"Tag\" while shooting a video to be able to go back to tagged moments during playback
Reduce noises generated behind the front camera
Point your camera at contact info, URLs, and QR codes to view available options
Optimize colors and contrast for 4K and 8K videos automatically. Optimized videos can only be played on HDR10 compatible devices.
Receive a notification when the lens is dirty
You can only record 720p videos with 240fps
You can only record 720p videos with 960fps
Receive real time notifications when people in the frame close their eyes or lens is partly covered during shooting
Open Camera at the previously used mode instead of switching to \"Photo\"
Switch camera to the previously used mode when you open the app.
Only the rear camera can scan QR codes in the \"Photo\" mode.
Tap again to go back to preview
To turn this feature off, press the Volume up and Back buttons simultaneously.
Camera settings;Quality;Image quality;Image location;Picture location;Face detection;Camera sound
Remove blurring when focusing on flat surfaces very close up
SD card is running out of space
USB storage is running out of space
Say \"拍照\" or \"茄子\" to take a photo
"Couldn't connect to the network. Can't transcribe now."
Place the moon in the circle
Moonlight falls at the foot of my bed, seeming like frost on the frozen ground.
Optimizing image… Keep your device stable.
Keep your phone steady while taking a photo
"Can't use this video-size for time-lapse recording"
"Can't burst shoot while audio capture is on"
Make a sound to take a photo
For best results, your photo should contain objects both near (less than 1 meter from the lens) and far
"Zoom doesn't work in %s Ultra HD mode"
"Use 50X zoom to capture distant objects in greater detail"
Ultra wide angle mode is off
"Use this mode to include more of the scene in your photo. Ultra wide angle mode comes to help when you can't move farther from the scene."
"Try 0.6X Ultra wide angle mode to include more of the scene in your photo. Ultra wide angle mode comes to help when you can't move farther from the scene."
Before using Camera, you must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy. Camera also needs to connect to the internet to work normally. Agree?
You can shoot vlogs only in the landscape mode
"Vlog mode allows you to record and edit videos on the go"
Rotate the phone to the left
Rotate the phone to the right
